pages.text: The Main Island is the arena for the $(l:mobs/ender_dragon)Ender Dragon$() battle. It is between 200 and 250 blocks in diameter mostly, and has a large population of endermen that attack neither the player nor the dragon, unless provoked.

At the center of the island is the $(l:blocks/bedrock)bedrock$() well, surrounded by eight $(l:blocks/obsidian)obsidian$() pillars of varying height with $(l:items/end_crystal)end crystals$() on top. All crystals heal the dragon and therefore must be destroyed before actually taking on the dragon itself. Some of the crystals are protected by $(l:blocks/iron_bars)iron bars$(), so you need to climb those pillars.

Once you manage to defeat the dragon, the bedrock well will open up a $(l:blocks/end_portal)portal$(), allowing you to travel home, and the $(l:blocks/dragon_egg)dragon egg$() will appear on top. Also, a gateway will appear (marked by a purple $(l:blocks/beacon)beacon$()-like beam), allowing you to travel to the $(l:end/outer_end)outer end$(), and $(l:items/biotite)biotite ore$() will generate.

It is also possible to re-summon the ender dragon by placing four end crystals at the four long edges of the bedrock well. This will cause the well's portal to close, and the battle to start again. If you defeat the dragon again, you will again receive the egg.
